news_header: The business conference in Beijing highlights a shift in the relationship between China's leadership and the private sector. President Xi Jinping held a meeting with key business figures, including Alibaba's Jack Ma, who has re-emerged after a period of absence due to past criticisms of the private sector.
news_original_title: Jopa Alibaban Jack Ma pääsi pannasta, kun Kiinan Xi tarvitsee kipeästi yksityistä sektoria vauhdittamaan kasvua
news_text: The conference aims to restore confidence in China's economy and encourage innovation and consumption, as the government seeks to support the private sector amidst ongoing economic challenges.
